Testing Theory

Testing in Continuous Integration part 1 Testing in Continuous Integration part 2:(Unit testing)

Importance of testing

Recognition of Error and Faults : Errors may be in unit level or in system level. After going through so many testing the application will be free of errors that may be disturbing the application.
Enhancement in Product Standards : Testing can help to know the real result and the probable result. With proper testing an application can come out of bugs and build up ideal software for the end-users.
Credibility Evaluation : If the software application has gone through all the testing types (like unit testing, regression testing etc.), the application will surely be a reliable one.
Avoid Fault Immigration : The faults can be noticed first stage of SDLC hence, these may be prohibited from immigrating to the following progress stage.
